data.text: Path on becoming even greener! #DidYouKnow that since October all our onboard lists are digital? It saves approximately 5kg of paper per day, 150 kg per month, 1.8 tonnes per year! Our Cabin Crew is not carrying long paper lists anymore, instead receiving all the data digitally. https://t.co/iU8vHbfGhL

We are ensuring the essential connectivity also this winter season! During December and January, we plan to perform over 2500 flights on over 45 routes from all Baltic countries. In December, the most popular destinations are Amsterdam, Oslo and London. https://t.co/EmSbclHtXW https://t.co/BYGPMZPdTE

data.text: @limnell Hey! Thanks for the interest. Currently there are no such plans however we will pass your tweet to our Network team!
@skylineowl https://t.co/pFPZa1Jxmu
@skylineowl We wonder, if it's edible though? 🤔 https://t.co/GjELRcIGAA

We have published our flight schedule for the upcoming Summer season that will begin on March 28, 2021. We plan to connect Riga with 65 destinations across our network, and to launch five new routes. 
✈️ Read more: https://t.co/vNHvU86ta9 https://t.co/wKs34BRAHh

#DidYouKnow that during the flight pilot duties are divided as Pilot Monitoring (PM) and Pilot Flying (PF)? While PF is generally responsible for aircraft maneuvering, PM takes care of communication, documentation and assists PF. https://t.co/KoiACrDAjO

@tom_belger We can once again confirm that the number is working and available.
We can invite you to try again from a different phone or operator, if possible. If there's not a big hurry, you may also e-mail us: reservations@airbaltic.com, however this may take longer time. Thank you.

@tom_belger Good morning! By your tweet time, it is possible you contacted us outside the working hours. We kindly invite you to try again by calling us: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
We can confirm that our international line is working and accepting calls. Thank you.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text: Our CEO @Gaussm will be sharing his thoughts and insights on the outlook for 2021 at @CAPA_Aviation’s #CAPALive. Register here: https://t.co/YZBu4jo9Ki https://t.co/LDwYKzP816

Good morning! ☀️ This time more than a half of you picked the right answer - our first @Airbus A220-300 aircraft began its commercial operations on December 14th, 2016 with a flight from Riga to Amsterdam. Have a wonderful week! 🤗
@lorlypop Hello! Please know we have replied to your private message. Thank you!

We're happy to announce @airBaltic Calendar of 2021 is available for purchase! As its title – wings for the new beginnings – suggests, we expect that 2021 will mark a new beginning in aviation: clean, green, and as full of passion as ever. 
💚 Get yours: https://t.co/WLeLJ94aUj https://t.co/aFnjHjQ7ef

Hurray to Friday and another #airBalticQuiz! 🤩 This week we celebrated four years since receiving our first A220-300 aircraft. Do you know the destination of our first commercial flight performed by this aircraft? ✈️
Pilots never stop learning! #DidYouKnow that pilots undergo simulator training every 6 months to improve and refresh their knowledge in non-standard situations? https://t.co/edu79Btpyv
@Jaspincairn1 Hello! Please know that currently we are not performing direct flights to/from Greece. For more information we kindly invite you to check our webpage https://t.co/GfcUoxQXuO!

data.text: Great news for passengers traveling between Vilnius and Kyiv! We have launched direct flights between the two cities, and the new flights will be performed two times a week on Airbus A220-300 aircraft. Read more: https://t.co/zqyozaDkM3 https://t.co/TmvNhN3JXE
@khabri_lal @Airbus Thanks for the kind words and sharing your memories!

Today we're celebrating four years since the beginning of @airbaltic @Airbus A220-300 fleet. On November 30, 2016, we received our first aircraft of this type, registered as YL-CSA! ✈️
When was your first flight with A220-300? https://t.co/KolK46hopM

Thanks for participating in the quiz! Majority of you were right! Although winglets reduce turbulence and drag, they also improve aircraft’s fuel efficiency! And look amazing, don’t they? 😎 https://t.co/xaaFoxnLiE
@BrunoTristans1 Labdien! Aicinām Jūs sazināties ar mūsu kolēģiem, kas apskatīsies Jūsu konkrēto gadījumu: https://t.co/jjI9s86avw

Time for our weekly #airBalticQuiz! Let’s explore the technical side of aviation. 🔧 The tips of airplane wings used to be straight. Can you guess - why the tips of the wings nowadays are curved upwards? ✈️
@AivarsTennisUK Great! See you on board! 😊
#DidYouKnow that silver stripes on the cabin crew jackets represent their rank? Senior cabin crew wear one line, while cabin crew team leaders and instructors wear two lines. https://t.co/AUcfdFEJ6l

data.text: #DidYouKnow that our aircraft with Latvian national flag during these two years have already performed 2599 flights? It has brought the Latvian national symbol to 70 destinations! https://t.co/PPSG19cPQZ
If there's one thing that makes us really happy and proud - it's the opportunity to call this beautiful country our home. Happy birthday, dear Latvia!🇱🇻 https://t.co/DlfVB0Yh4d

@skazis_ @PTACgovLV Pielikumā pilnas lapas ekrānšāviņš. Attiecībā uz Jūsu minēto par 200 EUR, cenas starpība tiek rēķināta no vecās un jaunās rezervāciju klases konkrētajā mirklī, kad veicat pieprasījumu. https://t.co/mf3Cf8rZW7

@skazis_ @PTACgovLV Rezervāciju klase šobrīd ir redzama gan veicot biļešu iegādi mūsu mājaslapā, gan pēc tās iegādes pasažiera rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pastā.
Attiecībā uz "burtiņiem", biļešu rezervāciju klases ir standarts aviācijā: https://t.co/UfF0vT4N9P https://t.co/7JOr0951co

@skazis_ Labdien! Biļešu maiņas nosacījumi atkarīgi no klases, kas iegādāta. Ja lidojuma datuma/laika maiņa nozīmē arī rezervācijas klases maiņu (tā pati rezervācijas klase Jūsu izvēlētajā datumā nav pieejama), Jums būs jāsedz arī cenas starpība. Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/basVOQPrAJ

data.text:

Please be informed that if your flights are still scheduled to be performed as planned, you can cancel the ticket according to the fare rules of it. Thank you!

data.text: Creating a menu is a very interesting process! #DidYouKnow that in result of altitude pressure person's senses of taste change? Knowing this, the chefs who are creating a new menu also take the flight, so they could fully taste the food that they will provide for passengers. https://t.co/LysEcnQczR

Landings in a new airport are always very exciting! Thank you @berlinairport for the warm welcome! #helloBER 

📷 by Flughafen Berlin Brandenburg, Thomas Kierok https://t.co/rO1qaj14sQ

@AnnieSW6 Hi! If your flight is still scheduled as planned, you may cancel the ticket according to its fare rules, or change the date of flights which is now available for all our ticket types. More: https://t.co/IVC41C11pP

urls.title: Change your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: For peace of mind, it's best to be completely prepared before your flight. However, if you have been a little bit careless, there are additional options available.

data.text: Good morning! ☀ This time most of you (73%) got the right answer - the airport code for the new Berlin Brandenburg Airport (@berlinairport) is BER! ✈️ See you in our flights there and have a safe and wonderful week!
@Punktinjsh Hello! At the moment we can confirm that we will operate all of the flights that are scheduled as planned. Please find our flight schedule here: https://t.co/DB70Q4L6iQ
An exciting new journey has begun - #helloBer! We are happy to announce that as of November 8, airBaltic will take you to a new airport in Berlin - @berlinairport! https://t.co/0MeYoGnJZB

Today we performed our last flight from Berlin Tegel Airport (TXL) to @riga_airport. Thanks to our partners for the great cooperation we’ve had throughout these years! Looking forward to many happy take-offs and landings in the new @berlinairport (BER)! https://t.co/dlRpM0CTEf

@Sauljuksss Hello! Passenger can have this covered individually with his/her medical insurer of choice. On top of that airBaltic offers all its ticket holders flexibility including date change possibility as well as others.

We have scheduled special flights on November 3 and November 5 from Tbilisi to Riga and vice versa. It is possible to book tickets for these flights via special phone line. More details: https://t.co/yn8RnyattD https://t.co/vobdiufnCq

airBaltic 3. un 5. novembrī veiks īpašos lidojumus no Tbilisi uz Rīgu un atpakaļ. Rezervēt biļetes iespējams, zvanot uz īpašo tālruņa līniju. Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/p8BHBD57Yh https://t.co/KQiC2UMS3b
